mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cartItemList WHERE cart_item_id = #{cartItemId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cartItemList WHERE cart_item_id = #{cartItemId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cartItemList (product_no, list_user_no, quantity, added_at) VALUES (#{productNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{listUserNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{quantity, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addedAt, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select (c.QUANTITY*p.PRODUCT_PRICE) from CARTITEMLIST c left join ADMINBASKET.PRODUCT p on c.PRODUCT_NO=#{productNo}=p.PRODUCT_ID where c.CART_ITEM_ID=#{cartItemId}
